CustomField.description: The system automatically selects this checkbox field when a user initially makes manual edits to the entity compliance records on the Entity Compliance route. By default, this field is deselected. This field is intended for future use.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field indicates if a user has manually edited the entity compliance record. When selected, the system does not automatically populate fields on the entity compliance record with values entered in the workflow.
CustomField.label: Is Manually Edited
